https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/sBZSbUQq7zVA8xpzwj7E2e3vYx4.jpg A struggling young artist meets a talented, and undiscovered songstress. Desperately seeking success, they both must face hard truths and contend with sacrifice on their individual paths to fame and along the way they find a love that teaches them what success is really all about. A Simple Promise
